hero.title: A platform for local-first gatherings around tabletop and board games.
hero.subtitle: We exist to make it easier for every visitor to step into a lively room, roll some dice, and leave knowing more people who care about their stories.

mission.title: Combat loneliness with joyful, real-life play
mission.description_1: Roundup Games was built for people who crave connection as much as they crave clever mechanics and collaborative storytelling. We nurture local-first experiences that are warm, low-pressure, and thoughtfully facilitated so you can arrive as you are and immediately feel seen.
mission.description_2: By hosting skill-sharing sessions, mentorship circles, and rotating campaigns, we give storytellers the room they need to hone their craft while introducing audiences to bold new worlds. Every initiative we ship is guided by the belief that play is a basic human need—and one of the most powerful antidotes to boredom and isolation.

belonging.title: Belonging at every table
belonging.description: We connect newcomers, veterans, and curious visitors with welcoming hosts so no one has to face another quiet evening alone.

storytellers.title: Stages for storytellers
storytellers.description: Roundup Games creates rehearsal-ready spaces where Game Masters can practice their craft, receive coaching, and showcase their narratives to engaged audiences.

purpose.title: Play with purpose
purpose.description: Every gathering is designed to spark laughter, curiosity, and long-term friendships through thoughtfully curated tabletop and board game experiences.

vision.title: Safety-first design for gatherings and data
vision.description_1: Trust is the foundation of every Roundup experience. We create brave spaces where participants can immerse themselves in narrative without worrying about physical, emotional, or digital harm. That commitment starts with trained staff on the floor and extends to how we store, permission, and act on your information behind the scenes.
vision.description_2: Our platform is continually evolving to meet the expectations of our community and partners. We invest in transparent reporting, responsible AI tooling, and collaborative policy reviews with experts in safeguarding, accessibility, and cyber security.
commitments: Dedicated community stewards and trained facilitators at every sanctioned event.
Safety tools—from consent check-ins to debrief circles—woven into session design.
Privacy-first data practices with encrypted storage, minimal retention, and transparent governance.
Continuous audits with partners who specialize in safeguarding vulnerable communities.

stories_insights.title: Articles coming soon
stories_insights.subtitle: We're assembling a library of essays, interviews, and progress updates so you can follow how the Roundup Games vision becomes reality across different regions.

mission_practice.title: Mission in practice
mission_practice.description: Stories from local chapters turning empty Wednesday nights into vibrant, cross-generational meetups.

vision_safety.title: Vision and safety standards
vision_safety.description: Deep dives into the policies, partners, and tools that keep our community feeling brave and respected.

roadmap_impact.title: Roadmap & impact reports
roadmap_impact.description: Quarterly updates on new platform features, regional launches, and the metrics guiding our decisions.

feedback.title: Feedback channels opening soon
feedback.description: We're designing a feedback portal where you can champion new ideas, flag concerns, and help us refine every experience. Until it launches, you can email
feedback.email_description: and our community team will route your note to the right people.

suggest_system.title: Suggest a new game system
suggest_system.description: Help us feature rulesets and universes that excite your tables and broaden our library of adventures.

nominate_venue.title: Nominate a venue
nominate_venue.description: Tell us about cafés, libraries, and community halls that would make incredible gathering points.

report_issue.title: Report a platform issue
report_issue.description: Share bugs, accessibility concerns, or content requests so we can keep improving the digital experience.
